Posts.Content: I actually had my first chemo the day they put in the port. It may not seem like it now but a lot of people come to value their port. I big puffy heart my port. Anyone else?
Posts.Title: Port and Chemo

Posts.Content: I agree with Derbygirl. We know the choices suck. None of them are fun choices. But radiation is the standard of care. Do you want "sub-standard" care? Plus, if you were to have a recurrence, would you look back and wish you had done the rads? Clean margins are good but they are not the be-all end-all to cancer. It only takes 1 stray cell. I am sorry for the tough words but if you think your choices are limited now, well, a recurrence will limit them even more. Or open them up to the choice of chemo cocktails. However you want to look at it.
Posts.Title: Is there anyone that had a wide excision for DCIS stage 0 & had clear margins?
